screen.hardcore_darkness.title: Hardcore Darkness
tooltip.hardcore_darkness.dark_skyless: Apply darkness to custom dimensions that have no sky light.
tooltip.hardcore_darkness.dark_end: Removes ambient light in the End.
tooltip.hardcore_darkness.require_mod: Disconnect players whose client lacks Hardcore Darkness.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.hardcore_: Moon phases and pitch black caves for a more immersive and dangerous experience. Easily configurable.
tooltip.hardcore_darkness.moon_phase_sty: Choose how moon phase affects sky brightness.
tooltip.hardcore_darkness.dark_nether: Removes ambient light in the Nether.
tooltip.hardcore_darkness.dark_default: Apply darkness to custom dimensions that have sky light.
tooltip.hardcore_darkness.ignore_moon_ph: Treat every night as a new moon for brightness calculations.
tooltip.hardcore_darkness.dark_overworld: If enabled, overworld nights become pitch black unless lit by blocks.
tooltip.hardcore_darkness.block_light_on: When enabled, only block light is affected; sky light stays vanilla.
tooltip.hardcore_darkness.nether_fog_fac: 0 is fully black fog, 1 keeps vanilla Nether fog lighting.
tooltip.hardcore_darkness.end_fog_factor: 0 is fully black fog, 1 keeps vanilla End fog lighting.
